scripts.start: yarn build && yarn workspace example-app start
scripts.bundle: yarn build && yarn workspace example-app bundle
scripts.test: cross-env CI=true lerna run test --since origin/master -- --coverage
scripts.release: if [ "$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD)" = master ]; then echo "don't try to release master"; exit 1; else lerna version --no-push; fi
scripts.lint: cross-env CI=true lerna run lint --since origin/master --
